{{n4list}}
This Special Skill identifies professional strategists, individuals with superior analytical minds and a wealth of knowledge on the art of war and its psychological implications.

{{skillbox |black| STRATEGOS L1 | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{requirements}}
* In order to benefit from this Level of Strategos, the user must be the army's [[Lieutenant]].
{{effects}}
* During the [[Deployment Phase]], you may set aside two [[Trooper]]s to deploy after your opponent instead of the usual one.
{{update | PDF 2.1, July 2023}}
* At the beginning of your [[Active Turn]], during your Order Count, replace {{erratahighlight}}any{{erratahighlight-end}} [[Lieutenant Special Order|Special Lieutenant Order]]{{erratahighlight}}s with{{erratahighlight-end}} [[Regular Order]]{{erratahighlight}}s, adding them{{erratahighlight-end}} to the [[Order Pool]] of the {{erratahighlight}}Lieutenant’s{{erratahighlight-end}} Combat Group.
{{update-end}}
{{original}}
* At the beginning of your [[Active Turn]], during your Order Count, replace {{originalhighlight}}the{{originalhighlight-end}} [[Lieutenant Special Order|Special Lieutenant Order]] with {{originalhighlight}}a{{originalhighlight-end}} [[Regular Order]] {{originalhighlight}}and add this Order{{originalhighlight-end}} to the [[Order Pool]] of the {{originalhighlight}}user's{{originalhighlight-end}} Combat Group.
{{original-end}}


{{skillbox |black| STRATEGOS L2 | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{requirements}}
* In order to benefit from this Level of Strategos, the user must be the army's [[Lieutenant]].
{{effects}}
* During the Tactical Phase of the Active Turn, in the [[Executive Use of Command Tokens]] step, the user of this Special Skill may move a [[Trooper]] to a different [[Combat Group]] without expending a [[Command Token]].
* During the [[Deployment Phase]], you may set aside two [[Trooper]]s to deploy after your opponent instead of the usual one.
{{update | PDF 2.1, July 2023}}
* At the beginning of your [[Active Turn]], during your Order Count, replace {{erratahighlight}}any{{erratahighlight-end}} [[Lieutenant Special Order|Special Lieutenant Order]]{{erratahighlight}}s with{{erratahighlight-end}} [[Regular Order]]{{erratahighlight}}s, adding them{{erratahighlight-end}} to the [[Order Pool]] of the {{erratahighlight}}Lieutenant’s{{erratahighlight-end}} Combat Group.
{{update-end}}
{{original}}
* At the beginning of your [[Active Turn]], during your Order Count, replace {{originalhighlight}}the{{originalhighlight-end}} [[Lieutenant Special Order|Special Lieutenant Order]] with {{originalhighlight}}a{{originalhighlight-end}} [[Regular Order]] {{originalhighlight}}and add this Order{{originalhighlight-end}} to the [[Order Pool]] of the {{originalhighlight}}user's{{originalhighlight-end}} Combat Group.
{{original-end}}
